languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт кривит губы.{/n} "Наши кузены искусны в создании препаратов, превращающих разумных существ в визжащую от страданий скотину. Иногда быстро, иногда, как сейчас, достаточно медленно, чтобы жертва добровольно выдала все, что ей известно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт кривит губы.{/n} "Наши кузены искусны в создании препаратов, превращающих разумных существ в покорную скотину. Иногда быстро, иногда, как сейчас, достаточно медленно, чтобы жертва добровольно выдала все, что ей известно".

languages.text: {n}Yrliet's mouth twists.{/n} "Our cousins are adept at creating concoctions that turn sentient beings into mere beasts shrieking in agonising pain. Sometimes the effect is quick, sometimes it leaves just enough time for the victims to divulge all that they know."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт кривит губы.{/n} "Наши кузены искусны в создании препаратов, превращающих разумных существ в визжащую от страданий скотину. Иногда быстро, иногда, как сейчас, достаточно медленно, чтобы жертва добровольно выдала все, что ей известно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet curls her lip.{/n} "Our cousins are adept at creating concoctions that turn sentient beings into mere shrieking beasts due to the agonizing pain. Sometimes the effect is quick, sometimes it leaves just enough time for victims to give up all that they know."

{n}Yrliet curls her lip.{/n} "Our cousins are adept at creating concoctions that turn sentient beings into mere shrieking beasts due to the agonizing pain. Sometimes the effect is quick, sometimes it leaves just enough time for victims to give up all that they know."

{n}Yrliet's mouth twists.{/n} "Our cousins are adept at creating concoctions that turn sentient beings into mere beasts shrieking in agonizing pain. Sometimes the effect is quick, sometimes it leaves just enough time for the victims to divulge all that they know."

{n}Yrliet's mouth twists.{/n} "Our cousins are adept at creating concoctions that turn sentient beings into mere beasts shrieking in agonizing pain. Sometimes the effect is quick, sometimes it leaves just enough time for the victims to divulge all that they know."

languages.text: {n}ユリエットが口を歪めた。{/n}「我らの血族は知覚的な生命体を、苦痛に満ちた悲鳴を上げるただの獣に変える術を熟知している。効果がすぐに現れることもあれば、被害者が知っていることをすべて暴露するのに十分な時間を残すこともある」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's mouth twists.{/n} "Our cousins are adept at creating concoctions that turn sentient beings into mere beasts shrieking in agonising pain. Sometimes the effect is quick, sometimes it leaves just enough time for the victims to divulge all that they know."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットが口を歪めた。{/n}「私たちの血族は知覚的な生命体を、苦痛に満ちた悲鳴を上げるただの獣に変える術を熟知している。効果がすぐに現れることもあれば、被害者が知っていることをすべて暴露するのに十分な時間を残すこともある」

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特的嘴角扭曲着。{/n}“我的表亲很擅长把生物杂糅在一起，将有智能的生物变成怪物，让他们在痛苦中尖叫。有的时候那些受害者很快就会死，有的时候会留下足够的时间，泄露他们所知道的一切。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's mouth twists.{/n} "Our cousins are adept at creating concoctions that turn sentient beings into mere beasts shrieking in agonising pain. Sometimes the effect is quick, sometimes it leaves just enough time for the victims to divulge all that they know."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特的嘴角扭曲着。{/n}“我的表亲很擅长把生物杂糅在一起，将有智能的生物变成怪物，让他们在痛苦中尖叫。有的时候那些受害者很快就会死，有的时候会留下足够的时间，泄露他们所知道的一切。”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet grimace.{/n} « Nos cousins sont passés maîtres dans l'art de créer des concoctions qui transforment les êtres doués d'intelligence en monstres hurlant de douleur. Parfois, elles agissent rapidement. Mais parfois, elles laissent juste assez de temps à leurs victimes pour cracher tout ce qu'elles savent. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's mouth twists.{/n} "Our cousins are adept at creating concoctions that turn sentient beings into mere beasts shrieking in agonising pain. Sometimes the effect is quick, sometimes it leaves just enough time for the victims to divulge all that they know."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet grimace.{/n} « Nos cousins sont passés maîtres dans l'art de créer des concoctions qui transforment les êtres doués d'intelligence en monstres hurlant de douleur. Parfois, elles agissent rapidement. Mais parfois, elles laissent juste assez de temps à leurs victimes pour cracher tout ce qu'elles savent. »

languages.text: {n}La boca de Yrliet se tuerce.{/n} «Nuestros primos son expertos en crear brebajes que convierten a los seres pensantes en simples bestias que se retuercen agónicas. En algunas ocasiones, el efecto es inmediato, mientras que en otras deja el tiempo justo para que las víctimas confiesen lo que saben».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's mouth twists.{/n} "Our cousins are adept at creating concoctions that turn sentient beings into mere beasts shrieking in agonising pain. Sometimes the effect is quick, sometimes it leaves just enough time for the victims to divulge all that they know."

traits.locale_text: {n}La boca de Yrliet se tuerce.{/n} «Nuestros primos son expertos en crear brebajes que convierten a los seres pensantes en simples bestias que se retuercen agónicas. En algunas ocasiones, el efecto es inmediato, mientras que en otras deja el tiempo justo para que las víctimas confiesen lo que saben».

languages.text: {n}Yrliet verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Unsere Vettern können Tränke herstellen, die intelligente Wesen in Bestien verwandeln, die vor quälenden Schmerzen schreien. Manchmal tritt die Wirkung sofort ein, manchmal bleibt noch genug Zeit, damit das Opfer alles preisgibt, was es weiß."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's mouth twists.{/n} "Our cousins are adept at creating concoctions that turn sentient beings into mere beasts shrieking in agonising pain. Sometimes the effect is quick, sometimes it leaves just enough time for the victims to divulge all that they know."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Unsere Vettern können Tränke herstellen, die intelligente Wesen in Bestien verwandeln, die vor quälenden Schmerzen schreien. Manchmal tritt die Wirkung sofort ein, manchmal bleibt noch genug Zeit, damit das Opfer alles preisgibt, was es weiß."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in ağzı çarpılıyor.{/n} "Soydaşlarımız, bilinç sahibi varlıkları acı içinde haykıran hayvanlara dönüştüren karışımlar yaratmakta uzmandır. Bunların bazen etkisini çabuk gösterip geçirir, bazense kurbanın bildiği her şeyi ifşa etmesine yetecek kadar uzun sürer."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's mouth twists.{/n} "Our cousins are adept at creating concoctions that turn sentient beings into mere beasts shrieking in agonising pain. Sometimes the effect is quick, sometimes it leaves just enough time for the victims to divulge all that they know."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in ağzı çarpılıyor.{/n} "Soydaşlarımız, bilinç sahibi varlıkları acı içinde haykıran hayvanlara dönüştüren karışımlar yaratmakta uzmandır. Bunların bazen etkisini çabuk gösterip geçirir, bazense kurbanın bildiği her şeyi ifşa etmesine yetecek kadar uzun sürer."
